name: Joey Ramone Cocktail from Peels
description: Photo: Yana Volfson This drink from Yana Volfson at Peels, a liquid tribute to rocker Joey Ramone, uses all American ingredients, from the Laird's Applejack, made in New Jersey, to Kedem grape juice, made from New York Concord grapes....

recipeInstructions.text: For Concord grape syrup: Boil three 22 ounce bottles Kedem Concord Grape Juice in a saucepan until it is reduced by half. Pour 450 grams of light brown sugar into a quart container and fill with reduced grape juice. Stir to dissolve sugar.
Combine all ingredients in bottom half of a cocktail shaker. Add ice, cover and shake. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve immediately.
